issue.title: [Python] Cleanup after moving Python related code into pyarrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17122](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17122). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is an umbrella issue for follow-up work that needs to be done after https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16340 is resolved.
